name: NEO Mushroom Garden
description:
Over 3 million downloads worldwide!
Updates every month!
Over 1000 quests and over 30 stages for you to enjoy!
Come and experience the very best in Mushroom Gardening!

※※No in-app purchases! 100% free to play!※※
Thank you everyone for 6 wonderful years!

[Notice Regarding Cache Cleaners]
Using third-party cache cleaners has been known to result in data corruption or lost data in “NEO Mushroom Garden”. To avoid this issue, please remove “NEO Mushroom Garden” from your cache cleaning app. We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your cooperation.

▶︎Over 1000 quests to challenge!
The most content yet in the “Mushroom Garden” series!
With over 1000 quests (In-game name: Order/Order+) covering every stage and Funghi, you can enjoy mushroom gardening any way you want.
By clearing quests, you unlock even more stages to explore, more Funghi to harvest, and more quests to challenge!
With special holiday and season-themed events, you can enjoy “NEO Mushroom Garden” for every occasion!

▶︎Over 30 unique and colorful stages!
Starting from the classic Mushroom Garden stage, expand your garden to a wide variety of locations, such as your school, hot spring, or even above the clouds!
Not only does the scenery change, the Funghi you can find changes too!
New stages (In-game name: Themes) are constantly being added, so you’ll never know what kinds of Funghi you’ll discover next!

▶︎New Skill: Grow Funghi instantly!
Mushroom gardening can take time, but with this new secret medicine you can grow Funghi instantly!
Take advantage of this new skill and harvest Funghi more efficiently than ever!

▶︎Simple to use, difficult to master? New “Funghi Food”!
With a tap of a button, feed your Funghi and watch them grow!
By upgrading your food machine and using different parts, you can create different kinds of food with various effects.
Some Funghi only grow when given the correct kind of food, so try different combinations and find the perfect recipe for you!

What is “Mushroom Garden”?
Featuring the lovable Funghi character from Japan, the “Mushroom Garden” series has received over 50 million downloads worldwide.
From the cute Funghi covering your screen to the satisfaction of harvesting dozens of Funghi with one swipe, our apps are fun and enjoyable for all ages.

Mushroom Garden Official Site “Funghi Paradise”:
https://namepara.com/en/

BEEWORKS GAMES Official Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/beeworksgames.en/

[Phone Compatibility]
NEO Mushroom Garden is not compatible with the following mobile devices:
・101K Honey Bee (Softbank)
・WX06K Honey Bee (William)
We apologize for the inconvenience
